Class oliverl_dv22olt.robot2.Maze

java.lang.Object
oliverl_dv22olt.robot2.Maze
public class oliverl_dv22olt.robot2.Maze extends Object
A maze to be traversed by various different robots. The maze is generated from a txt file where 'S' denotes the start position, 'G' denotes any goal positions and '*' denotes a wall. Blank spaces are traversable positions.
Author:
Oliver Lundqvist

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private int
    columns
    The largest number of columns present in the maze Not necessarily the number of columns in every row
    private final HashMap<Integer,Character>
    positions
    A HashMap containing the hashcode of all positions present in the maze
    private int
    rows
    The number of rows in the maze
    private oliverl_dv22olt.robot2.Position
    start
    The start position in the maze There can only be one start position in a given maze
